abilityEffect: To attach a [W] Energy card from your hand to Suicune, you must discard an Energy card attached to Suicune. (Attach the [W] Energy, and then discard an Energy card from Suicune.)

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 30 damage and the Defending Pok√©mon is now Asleep.
